committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management

official_title: To direct the Administrator of General Services to convey a certain United States Courthouse in Jacksonville, Florida, to the city of Jacksonville, Florida.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of General Services to convey specified real property located at 311 West Monroe Street in Jacksonville, Florida, including the U.S. Courthouse building, to the City of Jacksonville for use as a public administration building or for other public purposes.

titles.title: To direct the Administrator of General Services to convey a certain United States Courthouse in Jacksonville, Florida, to the city of Jacksonville, Florida.
